meta_title: AI Watermark Remover - Smart Image Watermark Removal Tool
meta_description: AI Watermark Remover: Online smart watermark removal for images, supporting batch processing. Protect your image copyright with fast, secure, efficient watermark removal.
meta_keywords: AI watermark remover, image watermark removal, smart watermark remover, online watermark removal, watermark removal tool, batch watermark removal, image copyright protection
section_intro_description: Upload images, mark watermark areas, remove with one click. Supports batch processing to protect your image copyright.
feature_upload_description: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP and other formats
feature_mark_description: Use brush tool to select watermark areas
upload_drag_drop: Drag and drop images here, or
upload_formats_size: Supports JPG, PNG, WEBP formats, max 10MB
empty_result_description: Upload an image and mark watermark areas, then click "Process Image"
section_why_choose_us: Why Choose Our Watermark Removal Tool
feature_speed_description: Advanced AI algorithms process images in seconds, no long waiting
feature_security_description: Local processing, no server uploads, protecting your privacy and copyright
feature_smart_description: Supports manual marking and auto-detection for various watermark types
alert_mask_first: Please mark the watermark area first!
alert_original_image_not_loaded: Original image data not loaded. Please re-upload the image.
alert_purchase_premium: You are currently a {{membershipName}} and cannot download HD images. Please purchase a membership plan to unlock HD export!
alert_processing_failed: Image processing failed. Error: {{error}}. Please ensure the marked watermark area is valid. Processing large images may take longer. If the problem persists, try using a smaller image or refresh the page.
alert_open_cv_not_loaded: OpenCV not fully loaded, please try again later.
alert_invalid_original_image_size: Invalid original image dimensions. Please ensure the image is properly loaded.
alert_invalid_scaled_image_size: Invalid scaled image dimensions. Please check image size.
alert_temp_canvas_no_data: Temporary canvas has no valid pixel data (after setTimeout). Please try refreshing the page or using another image.
alert_temp_mask_canvas_invalid_size: Temporary mask canvas has invalid dimensions (after setTimeout).
alert_cannot_read_source_image_temp_canv: Cannot create source Mat from temporary canvas pixel data.
alert_cannot_read_mask_image_temp_canvas: Cannot create mask Mat from temporary mask canvas pixel data.
alert_invalid_src_mat_type: Converted source Mat is invalid or type mismatch. Type: {{type}}, Channels: {{channels}}
alert_invalid_mask_gray_mat_type: Converted mask grayscale Mat is invalid or type mismatch. Type: {{type}}, Channels: {{channels}}
alert_dilated_mask_empty_or_invalid_size: Dilated mask Mat is empty or has invalid dimensions.
alert_dilated_mask_no_pixels: Dilated mask Mat has no valid pixels, watermark area may not be properly marked or is too small.
alert_dilated_mask_full_image: Dilated mask Mat fills the entire image and cannot be processed. Please mark only the watermark area.
alert_dilated_mask_type_mismatch: Dilated mask Mat type mismatch. Expected CV_8UC1, Got: {{type}}
alert_purchase_success: Thank you for choosing "{{plan}}"! (This is a demo feature)
alert_hd_export_limit_reached: You have exported {{count}} HD images today, reaching the daily limit of {{limit}}. Please try again tomorrow or upgrade your membership.
